articles.summary: Microsoft is mandating AI org employees return to the office 4 days weekly starting January 26. The policy targets employees within 25-50 miles of specific global Microsoft AI offices. Exceptions require approval from a direct report to AI chief Mustafa Suleyman, who joined Microsoft last week.
